pages.text: The $(bold)Throw$() command is a trick most Pet Rocksâ„¢ can easily learn.$(br2)While they may need some assistance from their owners in terms of direction, they are more than capable of launching a projectile in the direction you are facing.$(br2)The more time you give them to aim, the more accurate and
powerful the projectile will be.$(br2)You should always take heed to word your commands carefully as rocks are known to be extremely literal creatures.
